stories.title: Phase 1 Quick Wins - Bug Fix + File Elimination
stories.description: Fix /build decision file path bug and eliminate HODGE.md/context.json creation. Includes: fix build.ts:81 path check, remove HODGE.md creation from all commands, remove phase-specific context.json creation, add smoke tests.

stories.title: Phase 2 UX - Invisible Temp Files
stories.description: Replace bash heredoc commands with Write tool in /plan and /ship slash commands. Updates .claude/commands/plan.md and ship.md, maintains CLI temp file reading, includes integration tests.

stories.title: Phase 2 UX - Smart Decision Extraction in /build
stories.description: Extract Recommendation from exploration.md when /decide skipped. Update build.md to extract and prompt user with options, handle all response paths gracefully, integration tests for skip-decide workflow.

stories.title: Phase 3 Standardization - WorkflowDataExtractor Library
stories.description: Create reusable cascading extraction pattern based on /plan's logic. New src/lib/workflow-data-extractor.ts with generalized pattern for decisions/recommendations/test intentions, comprehensive unit tests.

stories.title: Phase 3 Standardization - Apply Extractor to All Commands
stories.description: Refactor all commands to use WorkflowDataExtractor. Update plan.ts, build.ts, explore.ts, decide.ts, harden.ts, ship.ts to use extractor, integration tests verify graceful degradation.
